attributes.action: New law for all dogs on leads in a public area or be fined
attributes.additional_details: Because their are to many owners with uncontrollable dogs claiming their dog listens to recall 90% of that time their dog has been off leads and hurt a member of the public or other animals so to help prevent these possibilities I think alot of public members would agree every dog should be on leads in public areas
attributes.background: To enforce  a law that ensures all owners have their dogs on leads in public areas at all times

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Make it compulsory for all dogs to be on leads on public land: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650650
